mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pet_info ( dog_reg_no, rfid_cd, dog_name, sex, kind_name, neuter_status, organization_name, office_tel, approval_status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{dogRegNo}, #{rfidCd}, #{dogNm}, #{sexNm}, #{kindNm}, #{neuterYn}, #{orgNm}, #{officeTel}, #{aprGbNm}, NOW(), NOW() )
